::KitKat:;

"I too still have loyalty to Megatron.  He is my leader.  But yes, 
Terrorsaur is fearce about his loyalty.  He will be my witness.  He 
will see that I can bring glory back to the Predacons.  Glory to 
Megatron.  He will help me. I am sure he will once he sees that we 
are doing it for Megatron, how could he object?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Phobia reached back into his storage compartment and pulled out the 
> holocube."These plans should give you the edge you need." He knew 
he 
> had her hook line and sinker.
> 
> "Now what would you like done about Terrorsaur? his loyalty to 
> Megatron bothers me, I am at your command." He held back a grin 
that 
> could give away his intentions. "Pull this mission off and the 
> council will think again about your worth, probably make you an 
> honorable leader in the Predacon military with a big promotion." 
The 
> power behind the thrown was the sweetest taste a Predacon could 
> experience. The leaders would blame the lackeys and the lackeys 
would 
> blame the leaders, nobody would blame him.
> 
> -- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > ::KitKat::
> > 
> > She jumped up,"What? expendable. I am not expendable like that.  
> > megatron may thing so, but I don't. No, I will not let myy team 
> jsut 
> > get wiped out and not have anything to show for it." She had 
> renewed 
> > confidence in herself.  She felt like she could lead this group, 
> and 
> > into victory as well.  "Phobia, did I hear you correctly earlier 
> > saying you had the plans for the ships? Can I have a look at them 
> > please?"
> >
